name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: RecruitBot - Bulk Resume Downloader & AI Applicant Screener

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bulk download resumes from job portals and extract candidate data into an excel file for AI powered filtering and review!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We help founders and recruiters drastically reduce the time spent hiring, without compromising on quality.

V1 of RecruitBot automates resume downloads from job posts on LinkedIn, saving hours in individually screening candidates.

We extract data from the downloaded resumes, entering it into a structured excel sheets, allowing you to apply filters and screen candidates at a glance.

Planned Product Features (Coming Soon):

1. AI Applicant Screening: Our AI will review your job description, understand your requirements and rank applicants based on best fit for the role;

2. Completely autonomous process: If you don't want the CVs stored on your device, we will manage the entire download and upload process on our servers, ensuring minimal manual intervention

3. Aggregation across Multiple Job Portals: Allows you to download and review candidates from all candidates for a job, aggregated across multiple job portals.
